---
title: TM-GCN
description: TM-GCN
url: https://github.com/IBM/tm-gcn
tag: "RA"
tags: ["RA"]
weight: 1
---



## Description

Pytorch code for the TM-GCN method, a Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks formulated using the Tensor M-Product algebra. 

* Tensor-tensor algebra for optimal representation and compression of multiway data, ME Kilmer, L Horesh, H Avron, E Newman, Proceedings of the National Academy of Science (PNAS), 2021, https://www.pnas.org/content/118/28/e2015851118.short
* Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks using the tensor M-product, O Malik, S Ubaru, L Horesh, M Kilmer, H Avron, SIAM International Conference on Data Mining (SDM 21), 2021, https://epubs.siam.org/doi/abs/10.1137/1.9781611976700.82
* New tensor algebra changes the rules of data analysis, IBM Blog, https://research.ibm.com/blog/new-tensor-algebra

## Main Contributors

Shashanka Ubaru, Osman Malik, Lior Horesh

## Description

Pytorch code for the TM-GCN method, a Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks formulated using the Tensor M-Product algebra. 

* Tensor-tensor algebra for optimal representation and compression of multiway data, ME Kilmer, L Horesh, H Avron, E Newman, Proceedings of the National Academy of Science (PNAS), 2021, https://www.pnas.org/content/118/28/e2015851118.short
* Dynamic Graph Convolutional Networks using the tensor M-product, O Malik, S Ubaru, L Horesh, M Kilmer, H Avron, SIAM International Conference on Data Mining (SDM 21), 2021, https://epubs.siam.org/doi/abs/10.1137/1.9781611976700.82
* New tensor algebra changes the rules of data analysis, IBM Blog, https://research.ibm.com/blog/new-tensor-algebra

## Main Contributors

Shashanka Ubaru, Osman Malik, Lior Horesh
